title: 有人知道ban、mute、jail指令权限吗？
author: dddfly
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content:
essentials.ban
essentials.ban.*
essentials.mute
essentials.mute.*
essentials.jail
essentials.jail.*

replies.author: WasimFu
replies.txt_content:
最低需要OP权限，玩家是不能打这些指令的，求最佳答案
